comments:
PHP file opened from outside of any workspace is not interpreted properly.
Highligting / Code folding is not working for the file.

Saving the file inside of an existing project causes Exception:
"getExistingModelForRead gave a null result"
An exception stack trace is not available.

The problem with the opening php file outside the workspace has fixed, but when 
you trying to save the file with "save as..", if you does not add a PHP 
extension  the eclipse does not recognize the file as PHP and throw errors :
